document.full_text: methane gas sparked explosions inside a coal mine in pakistan's southwestern province of baluchistan on sunday, killing at least six miners and trapping over 50 whose chances of survival seem slim, a government official said.
document.title: methane blasts in pakistan coal mine kill 6, over 50 trapped
lines_and_colors: methane gas sparked explosions inside a coal mine in pakistan's southwestern province of baluchistan on sunday, killing at least six miners and trapping over 50 whose chances of survival seem slim, a government official said.
